body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Guided Tours Park Staff offer Upper Cliff Dwelling Tours through the End of April, every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Please call the Tonto at (928)467-2241 to check availability, space is limited.           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Tonto National Monument National Park Service Centennial Birthday Bash      Time: 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join Tonto National Monument in wishing the National Park Service a 100th birthday on August 27, 2016. This free event will include ranger-led hikes to the Lower Cliff Dwelling, birthday party games, a scavenger hunt, a photo booth and more.  View Details
